examples: She was hesitant to remove her shoes, as her socks were rather smelly .

definitions.definition: Having a quality that arouses suspicion .
examples: The detective read the documents and thought, "Something sure is smelly about this case."

definitions.definition: Having signs that suggest a design problem; having a code smell .
examples: That smelly code needs to be refactored.
definitions.label_groups: figuratively , computing , slang , in extreme programming

secondary_definitions: ( figuratively ) Having a quality that arouses suspicion .
( figuratively , computing , slang , in extreme programming ) Having signs that suggest a design problem; having a code smell .
